price: To, a lõkacin da firgita ta tafi daga Ibrãhĩm, kuma bushãra tã je masa, Yanã mai jayayya a gare Mu, sabõda mutãnen Lũɗu!
arabic: فَلَمَّا ذَهَبَ عَنۡ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ ٱلرَّوۡعُ وَجَآءَتۡهُ ٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰ يُجَٰدِلُنَا فِي قَوۡمِ لُوطٍ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falammā dhahaba ʿan ib'rāhīma al-rawʿu wajāathu al-bush'rā yujādilunā fī qawmi lūṭin
